verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: By the Fig and the Olive.
verse.verse_3: And by this city of Security.
verse.verse_4: Undoubtedly, We have made man in the fairest stature.
verse.verse_5: Then We restored him to the condition of the lowest of the low.
verse.verse_6: But those who believed and did good deeds, for them there is an unending reward.
verse.verse_7: What! Then now causes you to belie the judgement?
verse.verse_8: Is not Allah the Greatest of all rulers?
